marklogic.body: Hi Kevin I hired a 800 (the XC wasnt available) during a visit to Oz in January. Went on a 2000kms tour with 5 other bikers. Found the an absolute doddle to ride, but as soon as I Reached any sort of speed, the turbulence! A nightmare. I wouldn't buy the bike because of that. A fellow rider highlighted another aspect: the excessive Heat on his legs generated by the motor/exhaust in traffic. Be interesting to read idc what you think.
